name: Spooky Spook Meow Meow
description:
An entry for Ludum Dare 51 "Every 10 Seconds"

You are the cat keeper. Make sure they don't die. Cats seem to be entering your grounds every 10 seconds. Make sure they have food to eat by entering the dark zone and harvesting crops.

~ BUT BEWARE ~ Forgotten cats linger in the darkness.

WASD to Move
Space or Left Mouse to Interact
